name: Mount View Luxury Resort
tagline: Elevate your stay  where nature meets elegance
about: Mount View Luxury Resort offers lavish suites, infinity pools, curated gourmet dining, and private balconies overlooking the breathtaking valley. Experience world-class hospitality combined with stunning natural beauty.

amenities.name: Infinity Pool
amenities.description: Heated infinity pool overlooking the valley with premium lounging areas

amenities.name: Premium Spa
amenities.description: Full-service luxury spa with experienced therapists and holistic treatments

amenities.name: Fine Dining
amenities.description: Multi-cuisine restaurant with award-winning chefs and scenic dining

amenities.name: Fitness Center
amenities.description: State-of-the-art gym equipped with modern exercise equipment

amenities.name: Conference Halls
amenities.description: Fully equipped meeting spaces for events and conferences

amenities.name: Concierge Service
amenities.description: 24/7 dedicated concierge for all your travel needs

rooms.name: Deluxe Valley Suite
rooms.description: Spacious valley-facing suite with king bed, premium amenities, and private balcony

rooms.name: Presidential Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious suite with separate living area, hot tub, and panoramic views

rooms.name: Standard Room
rooms.description: Comfortable rooms with modern amenities and valley views

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: An absolutely magical experience! The valley views from our suite were breathtaking, and the staff went above and beyond to make our anniversary special. Will definitely return!

testimonials.name: John Williams
testimonials.text: Best resort stay I've ever had. The infinity pool, the spa, the food - everything was world-class. The perfect blend of luxury and nature.

testimonials.name: Anjali Patel
testimonials.text: A perfect getaway from city life. The serene mountain views, premium amenities, and warm hospitality made our family vacation truly memorable.

seo.title: Mount View Luxury Resort - Premium Accommodations
seo.description: Experience luxury at Mount View Resort with stunning valley views, world-class amenities, and premium hospitality
seo.keywords: luxury resort, vacation, mountain resort, accommodation

og.title: Mount View Luxury Resort
og.description: Elevate your stay with luxury mountain resort experiences
